IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO ENSURE DIGNIFIED, RESPECTFUL, AND EQUAL ACCESS TO QUALITY CANCER EDUCATION AND SERVICES FOR ALL, BY CREATING MEANINGFUL PARTNERSHIPS WITH COMMUNITY, ADVOCACY, AND HEALTHCARE ORGANIZATIONS.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO ENSURE DIGNIFIED, RESPECTFUL, AND EQUAL ACCESS TO QUALITY CANCER EDUCATION AND SERVICES FOR ALL, BY CREATING MEANINGFUL PARTNERSHIPS WITH COMMUNITY, ADVOCACY, AND HEALTHCARE ORGANIZATIONS.
IRS990.Desc: THE CHICAGOLAND CANCER INFORMATION COALITION'S FOCUS AND PURPOSE IS TO DEVELOP INNOVATIVE COLLABORATIVE INITIATIVES IN AN EFFORT TO PROVIDE COMMUNITY-BASED EDUCATION AND RESOURCE INFORMATION TO CANCER PATIENTS WITHIN THEIR NEIGHBORHOODS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: THE EVELYN GOLDBERG RESPITE CANCER OPENED AT THE UNIVERSITY OF ILLINOIS MEDICAL CENTER AT CHICAGO ON OCTOBER 1, 2004. THE CENTER'S GOAL IS TO EMPOWER INDIVIDUALS TO ACTIVELY PARTICIPATE IN THEIR HEALTH CARE DECISION-MAKING BY IMPROVING UNDERSTANDING OF TREATMENT OPTIONS, AND ENCOURAGING DIALOUGE BETWEEN PATIENT AND PROVIDER, PROVIDING ASSISTANCE IN NAVIGATING THE HEALTHCARE SYTEM AND PROVIDING QUALITY OF LIFE SERVICES FOR PATIENTS GOING THROUGH CANCER TREATMENT.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: IN JUNE 2006, THE FOUNDATION BEGAN BUY A MOM A MAMMOGRAM TO FUND COST-FREE SCREENING MAMMOGRAMS TO MEDICALLY UNDERSERVED, UNINSURED/UNDERINSURED WOMEN AND MEN IN THE CHICAGOLAND AREA A DIAGNOSTIC COMPONENT IS ALSO IN PLACE TO ENSURE WOMEN IN NEED OF EVALUATION AND FOLLOW-UP TESTING WILL RECEIVE SUCH SERVICES IN A TIMELY FASHION RESPONDING TO THE BASIC NEED OF MEDICALLY UNDERSERVED WOMEN TO OBTAIN SCREENING, THE FOUNDATION PARTNERS WITH VARIOUS HOSPITALS TO PROVIDE ACCESS TO COST-FREE MAMMOGRAMS IN A TIMELY, DISGINIFIED, AND RESPECTFUL FASHION.

ProgSrvcAccomActyOtherGrp.Desc: THE EVELYN GOLDBERG MAMMOGRAPHY CENTER (ORIGINALLY CREATED IN 2004 AS A QUALIFY OF LIFE PROGRAM) WAS DEDICATED IN 2012 AND IS THE SITE FOR THOSE NEEDING A MAMMOGRAM AT THE UNIVERSITY OF ILLINOIS HOSPITAL AND HEALTH SCIENCE SYSTEM. IN 2012, THE FOUNDATION STARTED KEEP ABREAST WHICH IS AN INTERACTIVE BREAST CANCER AWARENESS PRESENTATION DESIGNED SPECIFICALLY FOR YOUNG WOMEN WITH THE GOAL OF ARISING AWARENESS OF THE IMPORTANCE OF BREAT HEALTH AND EARLY DETECTION. ADDITIONALLY, THE GOAL IS TO HAVE PARTICIPANTS SERVE AS CULTURAL AND EDUCATIONAL CONDUITS IN THEIR FAMILIES AND COMMUNITIES. IN 2014, THE FOUNDATION STARTED SURVIVE TO THRIVE WHICH IS DESIGNED TO SPECIFICALLY FOR WOMEN AND MEN WHO HAVE BEEN PREVIOUSLY DIAGNOSED WITH BREAST CANCER. THE PROGRAM IS TAILORED TO FIT THE UNIQUE NEEDS OF SURVIVORS WHO ARE UNISURED OR UNDERINSURED BY OFFERING NO COST DIANOSTIC TESTING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FOUNDATION IS GENERALLY EXEMPT FROM FEDERAL INCOME TAX PURSUANT TO SECTION 501 (C) (3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE (THE CODE) AND IS A TAX-EXEMPT ORGANIZATION DESCRIBED IN SECTIONS 501 (C) (3), 509 (A) (1) AND 170 (B) (1) (A) (VI) OF THE CODE. THE FOUNDATION HAS ADOPTED THE REQUIREMENTS FOR ACCOUNTING FOR UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS AND MANAGEMENT HAS DETERMINED THAT THE FOUNDATION WAS NOT REQUIRED TO RECORD A LIABILITY RELATED TO UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS AS OF JUNE 30, 2018 AND 2017.

RecipientBusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: UNIVERSITY OF ILLINOIS MEDICAL CENTER AT CHICAGO

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MAMMOGRAMS ARE FUNDED TO VARIOUS HOSPITALS IN CONNECTION WITH THE BUY A MOM A MAMMOGRAM PROGRAM. MONTHLY REPORTS A RECEIVED FROM EACH HOSPITAL OUTLINING EACH PROCEDURE PERFORMED. THESE REPORTS, WHICH CONTAIN A CODE NUMBER FOR THE PATIENT, ARE CHECKIN AND RECORDED AGAINST THE ORGANIZATION'S RECORDS.

BusTrInvolveInterestedPrsnGrp.TransactionDesc: SEE BELOW SCOTT'S COMPANY - PROXIT TECHNOLOGY SOLUTIONS, INC. - FOR IT SERVICES

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: DR. SANDRA A. GOLDBERG, CHAIRMAN AND FOUNDER, IS A PAID EMPLOYEE OF THE FOUNDATION, SHE IS MARRIED TO GREGORY N. HINES, A BOARD MEMBER OF THE FOUNDATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 2
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: SANDRA A. GOLDBERG, PHD AND GREGORY N. HINES ARE SPOUSES

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ONCE A DRAFT HAS BEEN COMPLETED, THE FORM 990 IS DISTRIBUTED TO THE MEMBERS OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS WHO ARE ABLE TO REVIEW, COMMENT, AND RESPOND WITH QUESTIONS. AT THE END OF THE REVIEW PERIOD, THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS ARE ASKED TO APPROVE THE 990 FILING. UPON APPROVAL, THE 990 IS THEN FILED WITH THE IRS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ALL DIRECTORS AND EMPLOYEES HAVE AN OBLIGATION TO: 1. AVOID CONFLICTS OF INTEREST, OR THE APPEARANCE OF CONFLICTS, BETWEEN THEIR PERSONAL INTEREST AND THOSE OF THE ORGANIZATION IN DEALING WITH OUTSIDE ENTITIES OR INDIVIDUALS. 2. DISCLOSE REAL AND APPARENT CONFLICTS OF INTEREST TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS, AND 3. REFRAIN FROM PARTICIPATION IN ANY DECISIONS ON MATTERS THAT INVOLVE A REAL CONFLICT OF INTEREST OR THE APPEARANCE OF A CONFLICT. ALL REAL OR APPARENT CONFLICTS OF INTERST SHALL BE DISCLOSED TO THE AUDIT COMMITTEE AND THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR OF THE ORGANIZATION. FAILURE TO COMPLY WITH THE STANDARDS CONTAINED IN THIS POLICY WILL RESULT IN DISCIPLINARY ACTION THAT MAY INCLUDE TERMINATION, REFERRAL FOR CRIMINAL PROSECUTION, AND REIMBURSEMENT TO THE ORGANIZATION OR TO THE GOVERNMENT, FOR ANY LOSS OR DAMAGE RESULTING FROM THE VIOLATION. AS WITH ALL MATTERS INVOLVING DISCIPLINARY ACTION, PRINICPLES OF FAIRNESS WILL APPLY. ANY EMPLOYEE CHARGED WITH A VIOLATION OF THIS POLICY WILL BE AFFORDED AN OPPORTUNITY TO EXPLAIN HER/HIS ACTIONS BEFORE DISCIPLINARY ACTION IS TAKEN.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: EXECUTIVE PAY IS DETERMINED BY REVIEWING SIMILAR ORGANIZATIONS' FORM 990 AND COMPENSATION SURVEYS, AND IS APPROVED BY A COMMITTEE, COMPRISED OF MEMBERS OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.
